ClassDesc: Class with information if a node is a collection. Use @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo#CollectionInfo#obtain_E@ to get an instance. Recycling is handled by the @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo_E@ to which this object is attached. A collection of items has rows and columns and may be hierarchical. For example, a horizontal list is a collection with one column, as many rows as the list items, and is not hierarchical; A table is a collection with several rows, several columns, and is not hierarchical; A vertical tree is a hierarchical collection with one column and as many rows as the first level children.
